QueryResult.text: select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, object_group_items.id odf_pk, object_group_items.CODE as code, object_group_items.group_id as group_id, UPDATED.FULL_NAME as updated_by, object_group_items.object_code as object_code, object_group_items.position as position, object_group_items.group_type as group_type, OBJECT_GROUP_ITEMS.CREATED_DATE as created_date, OBJECT_GROUP_ITEMS.LAST_UPDATED_DATE as last_updated_date, CREATED.FULL_NAME as created_by from object_group_items object_group_items JOIN srm_resources CREATED ON CREATED.user_id=object_group_items.created_by JOIN srm_resources UPDATED ON UPDATED.user_id=object_group_items.last_updated_by where 1 = 1
